item.title: Paired line plots
item.description: ggplot scripts to draw figures like those in the Dynamic Ecology post Paired line plots (a.k.a. “reaction norms”) to visualize Likert data library(ggplot2) library(ggpubr) library(data.table) set.seed(3) n <- 40 self <- rbinom(n, 5, 0.25) + 1 others <- self + rbinom(n, 3, 0.5) fd <- data.table(id=factor(rep(1:n, 2)), who=factor(rep(c("self", "others"), each=n)), stigma <- c(self, others)) The students are identified by the column “id”. The students two responses (self and others) are joined by a line using the geom_line() layer.
